title: Redesign and animate the entire Contact section (professional + dynamic)

requirements.text: Redesign the entire public Contact experience to look more attractive and professional, applying consistent visual improvements to both (a) the on-page Contact section on the main public page (HomePage section with id="contact") and (b) the standalone Contact page, while keeping the existing fields, content, and submission behavior unchanged.

quotes: make  contact information look attractive. animated

acceptanceCriteria: The on-page Contact section (Home page section id="contact") and the standalone Contact page present a clearly improved, professional layout (typography, spacing, card styling, and hierarchy) without removing any existing information or form fields.
The existing ContactForm submission flow remains unchanged: same validations, same success/error toasts, and still submits using the existing React Query mutation hook.
Mobile/tablet/desktop layouts remain responsive with no overlap/clipping and with comfortable spacing across breakpoints.
No new routes, navigation items, or backend APIs are introduced as part of this redesign.

requirements.text: Add professional, dynamic animations to the entire Contact section (form + contact info) including (1) an entrance animation when the section/cards become visible and (2) subtle hover/focus micro-interactions on interactive elements, while respecting accessibility best practices (including reduced-motion preferences).
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section content animates into view in a subtle, professional way (e.g., fade/slide with stagger) when scrolled into view, affecting both the form area and the contact-info area/cards.
Interactive elements (links, cards, inputs, submit button) have subtle hover/focus animations that do not distract or reduce readability.
Animations respect user motion preferences: when the user has reduced motion enabled, animations are removed or significantly minimized (no large movement).
Animations do not cause layout shift (no reflow that changes layout height/width during animation) and do not block interaction with the form.
Keyboard navigation remains clear: focus states are visible and any animations do not hide or delay focus indicators.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not change the backend canister code or schemas for this request.
Do not change the existing ContactForm field set (name, email, message) or its submission/validation behavior.
nonGoals: Adding new contact channels (e.g., WhatsApp, live chat) or new form fields.
Changing or adding authentication/authorization for contact submissions.
Building real-time messaging or notification features.
Replacing the existing UI library components under frontend/src/components/ui.
